query.oql: select distinct a.name, a.title, a.year from authors a where a.year = 1973
query.result: [name: Neuhauser, B., title: professor, year: 1973] [name: Takeno, K., title: PhD, year: 1973]

query.oql: select distinct a.name as nom, a.title as titre, a.year as annee from authors a where a.year = 1973
query.result: [annee: 1973, nom: Neuhauser, B., titre: professor] [annee: 1973, nom: Takeno, K., titre: PhD]

query.oql: select a.title from authors a where a.year = 1959
query.result: PhD assistant professor assistant professor professor

query.oql: select distinct a.title from authors a where a.year = 1959
